mapper.sql: select c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.price, c.lesson_num, d.description, c.subject_id, c.subject_parent_id, c.teacher_id from edu_course c left join edu_teacher t on c.teacher_id = t.id left join edu_subject s2 on c.subject_id = s2.id left join edu_subject s1 on c.subject_parent_id = s1.id left join edu_course_description d on c.id = d.id where c.id = #{courseId}
